gwendolyncrclclient

Class CShapes

  • java.lang.Object
    • gwendolyncrclclient.CShapes

  • public class CShapes
extends java.lang.Object
    Shapes is a container for the shapes in the kitting scene, the definitions defining the parts in the scene (gears, kits, supply vessel, as well as the slots in a tray).

      • findInstance

        public static CShape findInstance(java.util.Vector<CShape> shapes,
                                  java.lang.String aname)
        accessor function to find a matching name in the instances vector supplied as a calling argument.
        Parameters:
        shapes - pointer to vector containg shapes
        aname - name of the shape (sku with numeric trailing id).
        Returns:
        shape definition of the instance.

        public static void storeInstanceProperties(java.lang.String name,
                                           crcl.base.ModelsStatusType model)
        store the instance properties for given model. Will parse the crcl xml models in ther status report for inferences also.
        Parameters:
        name - sku type plus numeric trailing id
        model - name and pose of model.

        Parameters:

      • findSlot

        public static CShape findSlot(CShape tray,
                              java.lang.String slotname)
        given a tray with slot, find the shape definition for the given slot name (e.g., slot1, slot2, ...
        Parameters:
        tray - tray either kit or supply vessel that containes slots.
        slotname - name of the slot
        Returns:
        shape definition of the slot.

      • findFreeGear

        public static CShape findFreeGear(java.lang.String geartype)
        use the model inferences to find a free gear of type geartyp in the supply vessels.
        Parameters:
        geartype - type of gear, either sm, med, lg.
        Returns:
        shape definition of gear.

      • findOpenKittingGearSlot

        public static javafx.util.Pair<CShape,CShape> findOpenKittingGearSlot()
        find an open slot that in one of the kits.
        Returns:
        a pair: shape defoining the kit and open slot.
